evidence.claim: QS/1 utilizes AWS for its infrastructure needs, ensuring scalability and security for health data services.
The company's platform supports HIPAA compliant data transactions, including X12 and FHIR standards.
QS/1 integrates with various EHRs using FHIR APIs to enhance data interoperability.
They offer cloud-based solutions on Microsoft Azure for secure health information management.
QS/1 employs data streaming methods for real-time healthcare data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 EDI for data exchange, focusing on healthcare information integration.
